name: NBA Street Homecourt
description:
NBA Street Homecourt is a sports game developed by Electronic Arts Canada. It came out on 19-02-2007. It was published by EA Sports BIG. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
NBA Street Homecourt is available on PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
Dan Ayoub produced the game. It was scored by Andy Teal.
